divs: Sighting DetailsI took this picture in my sons backyard, it is an airplane landing at Mc Carran Airport in Las Vegas, Please tell me how those circles under the plane can form even if they are the landing ligthts? Thank You.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
